channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Delish
channel.desc: "Curry rice," one of Japan's most iconic national dishes. How did Jimbocho, Tokyo become a curry town.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Spring Party
channel.desc: We visit one of the most famous cherry blossom spots in Edo. Flower viewing parties were for eating, drinking and making merry. It was also an opportunity for young men and women to mingle.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Direct and in-depth. Interviews exploring the minds and motivations of the leaders, visionaries, artists and entrepreneurs who are changing our world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Kinota Braithwaite is an African-Canadian educator whose daughter was bullied because of her skin color. Braithwaite was inspired to create picture books that let all children know they are valued.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: On The Wings
channel.desc: Join us on a night flight to admire Japan's stunning views on a journey from Tokyo to Fukuoka. Behold the sublime beauty of Mt. Fuji at sunset and the sparkling night views of major cities.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This episode shows how services offering immersive cultural experiences are helping attract travelers to lesser-known towns and cities in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kabuki Kool
channel.desc: The historic figure of Minamoto no Yoshitsune has been immortalized in many kabuki plays as a child, a skilled warrior and a tragic hero. Explore with actor Kataoka Ainosuke.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Delish
channel.desc: Crisp, hot, and delicious Japanese gyoza! How did gyoza come to be so beloved in Japan? Taste the delicious truth for yourself.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Doodles Or Ukiyoe
channel.desc: A series of doodles by the famous artist Utagawa Kuniyoshi turn out to be carefully considered depictions of the kabuki actors of the day. What kind of artistic statement was he trying to make.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: Deep dives into cultural phenomena with Peter Barakan, a bilingual British broadcaster based in Japan since 1974. Each time, Peter himself discovers something new about Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Railway Journal
channel.desc: Departure melodies are musical versions of traditional train departure signals like bells. Join us as we take a look at this unique aspect of Japanese railway culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto
channel.desc: Kyoto dominated the oil market 1000 years ago. Various oils fueled votive lamps, flavored food, preserved wood, and were used in pomade and cosmetics. Oil still plays a key role in the culture today.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Lunch On!
channel.desc: We visit Sado, Niigata, to meet a renowned taiko drum performance group. Their meals, prepared by three dedicated women, are infused with the unique flavors of Sado, including local wild plants.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Mishiro Kenshi creates installations with ornate bamboo lanterns known as "take-akari." He talks about the potential of the craft, including his work to bring light to disaster-stricken communities.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: On The Wings
channel.desc: Hop on from Narita, the air gateway to Japan. Flying above the active volcanoes, breathtaking window views await.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: With colorful pile fabric and comfortable knits, Wakayama prefecture is drawing global attention as a textile hub. We bring you striking images of its machines and the beat of its factories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Delish
channel.desc: Japanese festival favorite, yakisoba! Noodles cooked in a special sauce. Enjoy local yakisoba from all over Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A woman from France is now an organic farmer in Okuma Town, Fukushima Prefecture. The town was affected by the 2011 nuclear accident. She is working to change that image.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trailblazers
channel.desc: * Broadcast only --- Tiara designer Kamitani Taro specializes in custom pieces. He's now working with a newly developed material, and we follow his creative process to see how he puts the sparkle into his designs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Designing Neighborhoods. Architects and artists work with landowners and local government to shape appealing neighborhoods with strong character. Explore this next-generation approach.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: In the Philippines, one woman has developed an advanced organic fertilizer made from food waste. She hopes her product can be a dual solution for issues of waste and poverty.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Kobayashi Kunio is a celebrated bonsai artist working to secure the future of this traditional art form through outreach to children, and through efforts to protect the iconic shimpaku juniper.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Morita Hirokazu heads an NPO which collects used children's wheelchairs and sends them to physically disabled children overseas. He explains the system and its 20-year history, and what drives him.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Detecting vulnerable plaques is now possible using the latest intravascular imaging technology. We focus on how this can help with early detection of heart disease and prevention of its recurrence.

channel.title: Viewpoint Science
channel.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Wild Hokkaido!
channel.desc: Below your eyes is the Sea of Okhotsk in the season of drift ice. Climbers are scaling a huge icefall reaching 40 meters high.

channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Japan has a long history of natural disasters. BOSAI explores how to overcome them and save lives with the power of science.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-12.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: On this unique trip around Japan, discover the lesser-known charms and customs of regions through the eyes of cats! Filmed by wildlife photographe,Iwago Mitsuaki.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Anime Manga Explosion
channel.desc: This time, we feature the legendary Yasuhiko Yoshikazu, renowned for Mobile Suit Gundam and many more hits. Watch and learn how his passion drives him to keep creating anime and manga at 77.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: A unique walking-eye view of cities around the globe! Chat to the locals and enjoy encounters that only strolling the streets can bring.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Through The Kitchen Window
channel.desc: For over 300 years, a special bento shared during a local kabuki performance has been bringing these islanders together. Hikari Mimura and her husband work to carry on the tradition.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Asking a shop manager to follow orders from head office. Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions and understand business culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
channel.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-12.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: On this unique trip around Japan, discover the lesser-known charms and customs of regions through the eyes of cats! Filmed by wildlife photographe,Iwago Mitsuaki.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Through The Kitchen Window
channel.desc: For over 300 years, a special bento shared during a local kabuki performance has been bringing these islanders together. Hikari Mimura and her husband work to carry on the tradition.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Asking a shop manager to follow orders from head office. Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions and understand business culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
channel.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Mizushiri Yoriko won the Silver Bear in the short film competition at the 2025 Berlin International Film Festival. She talks about her passion for creating animations that evoke a sense of touch.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Japan has a long history of natural disasters. BOSAI explores how to overcome them and save lives with the power of science.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: In response to a serious labor shortage, Japan's taxi industry is hiring more and more foreign drivers. The program introduces the efforts by both the government and taxi companies to facilitate this.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #38 I prefer outside. / To say which of 2 options you prefer, say the name of your choice, and "no hoo ga ii desu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We meet Ashley Souther from the US, who teaches a class on peace at a high school in Hiroshima, as well as Sten van Daalen from the Netherlands, an apprentice potter in Saga Prefecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: This program introduces NHK's new AI-powered Swahili voice service and covers an NHK World-Japan-related event held at the Embassy of Tanzania in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today, Hagi and Tsuwano: 2 Castle Towns.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 36 people in Japan are foreign residents. As its population declines, we look at Japanese society in a new era of foreign workers, through an IT startup where 90% of staff are foreigners.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Riverside Sawmill
channel.desc: Workers at a sawmill use the latest tools and their honed skills to prepare the building blocks of Edo life: long, narrow beams, bamboo stems and leftover wood stacked as high as buildings.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan

channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today, Hagi and Tsuwano: 2 Castle Towns.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: The five-year survival rate for lung cancer is increasing. Tests can now identify gene mutations, enabling treatment with targeted drugs. We share the latest developments in lung cancer treatment.
